pages.title: Controller
pages.text: The Controller is your main interface to the Energizer.$(br2)Right-click on the Controller to open its graphical user interface, and from there, you can turn the Energizer on or off, check how much energy is present in the machine, and see how it flows in and out of it.
If you hover over a control in the interface, a tooltip will be displayed with additional information or explanatory text for that control.$(br2)
pages.title: Controller

pages.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() at least one is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any vertical face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
